vision.title: VISION
vision.content:
Toward becoming the world’s largest independent third-party advertising platform,

supporting the production of 1,000 brands and 100,000 companies,

and building the world’s largest international intelligence platform.

yeahmobi.title: Yeahmobi
yeahmobi.desc: Based on advanced ad technology and data analysis, we leverage advertising operational capabilities such as Performance Networks (DSP, Affiliate Networks, etc.). By doing so, we provide each client with services that ensure the acquisition of high-quality users and maximize advertising revenue.

oversea.title: Overseas Advertising Business
oversea.desc: From smartphone games, apps, to cross-border e-commerce, we offer clients integrated one-stop services including creative production, market research, data analysis, media strategy, and implementation. We help clients expand their business overseas by providing comprehensive marketing solutions.

zMaticoo.title: zMaticoo
zMaticoo.desc: zMaticoo is a programmatic advertising platform. By utilizing advanced algorithms and AI technology, it enables real-time data-driven marketing across multiple channels. With its full-stack real-time data analysis, it provides superior advertising performance for global advertisers and mobile app developers, supporting user acquisition and higher ROI.

categories.title: Service Categories

strategy.title: Strategic Planning
strategy.text: We propose multi-dimensional market analysis, strategies, and program planning to strengthen customer acquisition, product, and promotion activities.

creative.title: Creative Design
creative.text: We provide localized creative ideas, content production, and timely support.

media.title: Media Operations
media.text: We manage optimal media release distribution for target audiences, in-depth purchasing insights for major platforms, and advanced tracking for ROI improvement.

insights.title: Industry Insights
